task.title: How to register in Gmail
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to register in Gmail.

prereq.p: You need to have an internet connection.
You need to have basic computer skills.

context.p: You will learn how to register in Gmail.
Now you will able to send emails.

step.cmd: Click on "Gmail" on top right corner.

result.p: You have successfully created an account in Gmail.

example.p: You can create an account in Gmail if you need to send emails to other people as it's one of the best email providers.
